channel.title: Community Radio
channel.description:
The suggested playtime is a half hour to an hour and a half so I expect this to run under 2 hours. It will be recorded and posted for viewing per the consent of all involved.
**Community Radio: A Game of Strangeness on the Airwaves is by Quinn Murphy** Is a dark comedy improv (gm-full) game that tells the stories of an isolated and weird community. It stitches together improv “slice of life” stories together in the dispatches and announcements of the local public radio host, who may or may not be completely beholden to a sinister and mysterious City Council.
The game focuses on the split between reality and how people report on it. Touchstones are: Welcome to Nightvale, Gravity Falls, WKRP in Cincinnati, Northern Exposure, John Hodgeman's Complete World Knowledge and They Live.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
